summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Public Library; making a contingent appropriation from the Unrestricted Account - Capital Projects in the Cumulative Reserve Fund of investment interest earned up to Two Hundred and Fifty Thousand Dollars ($250,000.00) on the unexpended project balance monies received from the State of Washington for the exclusive renovation of the facility housing Washington Talking Book and Braille Library.
committee: Health, Housing, Human Services, Education and Libraries
